website_summaries.verdict: A top-quality high-energy snack that blends smoothly and gives you the boost you need to get going.
pros: We loved all the energy-boosting properties the Nativas brand has
You might even be able to switch out coffee in the morning just by adding this to your breakfast or morning smoothie
It blends easily and has the typical hemp seed taste
cons: Be sure to have a container to store your hemp seeds to prevent them from going bad

customer_reviews.title: Helps me with tummy problems
customer_reviews.text: I've only been using this a couple of weeks. I mix 2 tablespoons of this and 1scoop of Nature's Bounty Vanilla protein powder into a large glass with about 8-10 ounces of vanilla almond milk. Tastes okay. I have noticed that if I drink this every morning that it helps with IBS. The couple of times that I skipped it, my tummy was back to it's old problems the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Ceedy

customer_reviews.title: Not a pack of two!!
customer_reviews.text: The description for this product says “pack of two” which made sense since I was paying $16+ dollars. I only received one 8oz package. I was going to request a refund but was offered an entirely new order for my troubles so I accepted, but yet again I only received one 8oz package when I should have gotten two. I didn’t request another refund because I essentially got the two I paid for but beware that if you order this “pack of two” deal. You will only get one 8oz package.
customer_reviews.author: A. Cintron

customer_reviews.title: PRICEY for such a SMALL AMOUNT!!
customer_reviews.text: Pricey for such a small size...I'm glad I found the other brand, Manitoba Harvest Hemp Hearts Raw Shelled Hemp Seeds, 1lb, where you get twice as much for less $$ than this!
customer_reviews.author: JUDGEMENTtime

customer_reviews.title: Great meat protein substitute
customer_reviews.text: I use this with my son for his blended diet. He is strictly G Tube fed and this works as a great substitute for meat protein. He can't tolerate a lot of food so this works well because it has high protein but low volume. Its a necessity for us in his diet to make sure he is getting all the nutrients he needs.
customer_reviews.author: Ana T.

customer_reviews.title: Must have for weight loss!!!
customer_reviews.text: So getting back in shape calls for tearing down muscle and rebuilding it with protein. The only problem is that whey, and plant protein gave such gas and gastro problems. NOT WITH THIS, the taste is amazing and goes perfectly in smoothies with coconut milk, berries, bananas and peanut butter. Thank you so much for a BETTER alternative to whey.
customer_reviews.author: Nikita

customer_reviews.title: Strong flavor!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a natural vegan protein powder filled with vitamins and nutrients. I definitely recommend this because it's so good for you. The downside is that it does have a very strong unpleasant taste. With that being said, you can easily mask the flavor with other strong flavors. I use it in mine and my son's smoothie bowls that we make every morning. We're easily able to cover up the taste with fruits that we use in our smoothies. It's a great way to get added nutrition into your kids without them knowing it.
customer_reviews.author: chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Easy to digest
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to boost my protein intake. I have two GI conditions that make digestion of food difficult, but this item is very easy to digest and provides so much more protein than other sources.
customer_reviews.author: K.I.

customer_reviews.title: Changes color of beverages but NOT gritty
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this in morning smoothies. I have found that it definitely changes the color to a rather murky looking brownish green, if appearance bothers you. However it is NOT gritty in my experience and doesn't seem to impart all that strong of a flavor. Basically its invisible other than the color which to me is not an issue. I just drink it in an opaque container. I haven't tried any other hemp proteins but this one has satisfied all my requirements so far.
customer_reviews.author: AllyPharm

customer_reviews.title: May cause cancer
customer_reviews.text: Product has a warning about containing lead on the side.
customer_reviews.author: Elijah Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting animal tooth in the product!
customer_reviews.text: I found a tooth in the powder! This product is absolutely disgusting. I found an animal tooth in the product. Thankfully I didn’t ingest the tooth. Gross!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend and worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product so I can add a little bit of nutrients to my smoothies and I really like it. I usually just use a tablespoon in my smoothies and you barely taste it if that’s what’s your worried about. The scent by itself is very herbal. I feel like each time I put it in my smoothies it gives me a boost of energy. Would highly recommend and worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Alondra

customer_reviews.title: Package arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: I just received this package, but am not comfortable trying it because it arrived with a hole in it and powder spilled on the outside. I did not use scissors, but opened the box with my hands, undoing the tape. Is there a way to replace?
customer_reviews.author: KJohnson

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I got this to add to smoothies and the taste isn’t great. Also, the serving size is 4 tablespoons which is SO much!! I can’t use that much with the way it tastes. Luckily it’s not that big of a package so I’ll go through it quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Natural energy/protein powder that really WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: Used it for a month & I see a difference in the extra energy I have while exercising. I don’t feel my heart pounding like the other synthetic energy enhancers on the market, plus it has protein. The taste is bland and chalky but ok overal. I finally found my natural energy powder, this one is a keeper!!
customer_reviews.author: Eddie K

customer_reviews.title: Not really my favorite
customer_reviews.text: This powder tasted nasty compared to other brand that I have tried. I will not order again. Sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Irina

customer_reviews.title: Decent taste and texture
customer_reviews.text: I am whey protein intolerant, so was looking for a non-dairy protein powder that I could tolerate. This dissolves in water/smoothies much better than anything else I have tried with no chalky taste. Any other non-dairy powder I have tried literally made me gag even when blended into a smoothie. This I can tolerate. If you're sensitive to the texture of most other protein powders, try this!
customer_reviews.author: Faidah

customer_reviews.title: Not a “pack of two” as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered and paid for a “pack of two” 8 oz bags per product description. Only one 8 oz pack arrived. The single 8 oz bag was wrapped in a second plastic bag as if it was supposed to be a set of two bags. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: M Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Hemp sprinkled on our food
customer_reviews.text: We just use this over cereals, or yoghurt in the mornings. We feel it is a quality product, and it has a nice fresh nutty taste
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia M. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Quality stuff. I mix with a banana, blueberries, maca root powder, cocoa powder, coconut almond milk, cinnamon, ginger, and peanut butter.
customer_reviews.author: Josiah Schulz

customer_reviews.title: Great for people with Allergies/sensitivities to ingredients in most protein powders!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff was amazing. I have a ton of allergies, so I can't use most protein powders. I love that this was organic, and doesn't have a super strong flavor. It's a little nutty. I found myself throwing it in my baking recipes and smoothies on a regular basis. I feel like most protein powders have flavors like chocolate, vanilla or strawberry. I hate that and loved that this one doesn't have a flavor that will throw off the things I'm adding it to. The only thing is that it's a bit pricey, but I would buy it again for sure!!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey R.

customer_reviews.title: Taste great and an allover feel good product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I so love this product. I’ve been in a serious health kick for awhile now, and adding hemp tommy smoothies has significantly been a bonus! I’ve noticed that my skin looks. Orr vibrant and I’ve lost weight. It’s quite filling and taste great. It’s a great value for your money!
customer_reviews.author: Lady V

customer_reviews.title: Hoping it makes me feel better
customer_reviews.text: Some supplements worsen my silent acid reflux, I just started adding this to my smoothies, we'll see how it works, or doesn't work with time.
customer_reviews.author: S. Horvath

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't dissolve in smoothie
customer_reviews.text: I used this hemp powder in a Keto morning coffee drink, hoping that it would completely dissolve. It does not dissolve but remains a gritty sludge, even after a full minute in the Magic Bullet. Have not tried it in baking.
customer_reviews.author: lkeg

customer_reviews.title: Strong taste overwhelms other flavors
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know a ton about the health benefits of this stuff. Hemp powder was an ingredient in some smoothie recipes I found. Every time I use it, though, even a small amount, the heavy planty flavor overwhelms the more pleasant flavors in my smoothies. Maybe just me.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Maness

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is great product. I have purchased the hemp seeds in July 2014 and will keep ordering on a regular basis. Gives me a lots of energy, perfect source of protein and magnesium. I would recommend this product to everyone to eat just as it, or add to salad. Very delicious! The package received July 1st contains hard substance like a sand pieces in it ....I almost broke my tooth. It never happened before, until now. both packages have the hard sandy substances. I hope this was just one time bad experience...?
customer_reviews.author: MT(Monroe)

customer_reviews.title: Energizing. Not bad tasting.
customer_reviews.text: I always feel better when I take hemp protein. This is a little more expensive than some I have bought but I was in a hurry and wanted it delivered to my hotel PRONTO! Tastes ok enough with plain water, ice cold.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas Mombat

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: I just started ordering food and nutrition items on amazon. It is much cheaper than Whole Foods or another health store. I have used this product previously. I use it daily to add protein to my smoothies. It is organic, vegan, raw, non-gmo. It is a nice protein that doesn't contain dairy or gluten.
customer_reviews.author: RHBK

customer_reviews.title: Okay but headache when used - I'd stay off it ...
customer_reviews.text: Okay but headache when used - I'd stay off it no headache - try couple days later headache - increased water tried again and headache. Don't know why my bp runs low so not a bp issue - so just something to watch for.
customer_reviews.author: David H

customer_reviews.title: This is good hemp powder.
customer_reviews.text: I am putting this in my morning smoothies for the quality protein and fiber it provides. Does not mix in liquid without an emulsifier. The flavor is a bit strong, and of course it's a little gritty in liquid (but all fiber is).
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Lavene

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this product at the local Sprouts. Then, found them on Amazon and will continue purchasing them through Amazon. I also purchased Walnuts. My diet has always been a healthy one but really trying to tighten it down even more.
customer_reviews.author: Diane White

customer_reviews.title: Best protein!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best protein I've found! I've tried so many and none compare to this. Keeps me energized throughout the day, tastes great-no grittiness when I mix in smoothies, you get SO much for your money and helps with my migraines. I get them regularly and most protein actually makes them worse but this hemp protein helps tremendously. Great product all around!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Goes great with anything
customer_reviews.text: I loved theses little seeds, I throw them on salads, in smoothies, oatmeal, etc. I am out and will be repurchasing! I just wish you got more in the package.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Cili

customer_reviews.title: The best !
customer_reviews.text: One of the very best proteins on the market, the hemp protein mixes great in my daily smoothies and doesn’t effect the consistency or flavour. By far my favorite protein out of the hundreds on the market and all natural ingredients
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Green protein
customer_reviews.text: As someone who practices a primarily plant based diet, my nutritionist recommended hemp powder to bump up my protein. I add this to my oat bran in the morning and it adds a light nutty flavor. I hardly notice it anymore (except for the green color).
customer_reviews.author: catglasses12

customer_reviews.title: Excellent plant based protein
customer_reviews.text: I use this hemp powder daily in my smoothie as a source of pure vegetable-based protein. You can’t beat it and this price is excellent. If you’re looking for chocolatey stuff all full of chemicals this is not for you. This is pure and simple. What could be better?
customer_reviews.author: Keri

customer_reviews.title: Heathy
customer_reviews.text: I actually like it for breakfast Almond Milk, One banana , Two spoon of hemp, vanilla extract blended and good to go. So many ways you could use it
customer_reviews.author: Betty Louis Jean

customer_reviews.title: Great protein supplement
customer_reviews.text: I use this every morning in a "power drink" as a protein supplement and also for its micronutrients. High quality product that is conveniently packaged. I will keep getting on Amazon because sometimes it is hard to find in stores
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: This can be added to so many foods and baked goods to increase the nutritional value. I even add some to chocolate walnut milk. Blends in nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Bevy

customer_reviews.title: Versatile product packed with omega 3 and 6
customer_reviews.text: Love the ground hemp seeds. They go great in many dishes like steel cut oats in the morning and soups and stews in the evening. So superior to taking fish or krill oil supplements and more convenient than eating fatty fish.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Kovarik

customer_reviews.title: Very Good!
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my smoothies. 2 tbsps along with some berries , wheat grass, almond milk and coconut water. Sometimes I add chia seeds and almond butter. It is very filling and the hemp powder taste is not overpowering.
customer_reviews.author: Enthu

customer_reviews.title: Taste pleasant. Drink looks green but doesn't taste "green"
customer_reviews.text: Ready to reorder. 70 1/2 years old. Feeing so much better, much more energy.
customer_reviews.author: 4 my pets

customer_reviews.title: Great for migraine suffers
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of food intolerance, and this is great for a migraine sufferer. It's nice to find a safe protein powder to fill out my smoothies.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin Burge

customer_reviews.title: Not quite delicious
customer_reviews.text: I stopped after the first bite. I was expecting a nutty or seedy quality. Turned out to be more like Milk of Magnesia bits. Rather soft and creamy.
customer_reviews.author: jharles

customer_reviews.title: Package leaks
customer_reviews.text: Two separate bags by this brand and both packages the powder spills out of the bottom somehow
customer_reviews.author: Cash

customer_reviews.title: Missing 1 item
customer_reviews.text: I paid for 2 bags.. the box was open and only 1 bag was in the box.. Not happy. How do I report this problem? I do not see a button for problems, just a return button. I know I will want to get this in the future but how can I trust the next order Jim Peer
customer_reviews.author: JPeer

customer_reviews.title: You will buy it again and again
customer_reviews.text: Like everything about this product, stays fresh and retains great flavor
customer_reviews.author: Retired

customer_reviews.title: I love hemp seeds
customer_reviews.text: I love hemp seeds. No, I am not a hippy but like chia seeds, hemp seeds pack a nutritional punch. In the evening I take Greek yogurt and add chia seeds, hemp seeds, pomegranate seeds and some flavoring used for water, add kefir and have an evening snack that is better than ice cream and HIGHLY nutritious. I also like the slight crunch you get. Have now ordered these twice and will continue to order. LOVE THEM!
customer_reviews.author: Мартин

customer_reviews.title: I Am DEA-Qualified To Cook & Prescribe Anything
customer_reviews.text: Six ounces cooked overnight with five potatos & Nutiva hemp oil at 200 Centigrade continuously adding Elev8 tea, it makes lovely rape/PTSD medicine. It is lovely not heated also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Health Food
customer_reviews.text: I like the taste. I am hoping it works for medicinal reasons as it is stated as a super food. It is a small size to eat which is great for people who has lost teeth or who like food in small amounts.
customer_reviews.author: TrishinTennessee

customer_reviews.title: My bf loves it in his oatmeal!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my bf as he loves oatmeal and I figured this would just add a bit of fatty acids (which is great for the body). You cannot taste them at all so that a plus also! My bf uses it every morning in his oatmeal and loves it! so I will be buying more when he is out.. seems like it lasts forever though lol.
customer_reviews.author: HoneyB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for those with lactose issues!
customer_reviews.text: Tastes as good as hemp can taste! I have issues with digesting milk so this is a great alternative for protein drinks. The taste is very pungent, I suggest mixing with peanut butter as that made my smoothies taste so much better than just berries.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy L Wade

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the pack of two but only received one.
customer_reviews.author: AtomicRancher

customer_reviews.title: Taste just like hemp seed
customer_reviews.text: Taste just like hemp seed, but it’s a little grainy for anyone that doesn’t like the taste of hemp seed. I personally like it.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: they taste like almonds or pecans
customer_reviews.text: Yummy! I take a tablespoon a day and to me, they taste like almonds or pecans.
customer_reviews.author: D. Deckard

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This hemp powder is great! Great amount for the cost! I love putting about 4 tablespoons in my muffins! Great source of protein and vitamins and minerals!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Good for smoothies
customer_reviews.text: I mix this in with my smoothies. Blends pretty well. Seems fresh
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Hemp
customer_reviews.text: Works good helped me with pain, bowel too If someone is have constipation problems this helps greatly. Uses a heaping T in my shake works wonders! 2 banana, strawberries 7 or so, 2 cups of ice, big apple, grapes (5-10) too and 2 cups of almond milk--very good esp cold :)
customer_reviews.author: Peaches3

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Fast shipping!
customer_reviews.text: Love hemp seeds! I have been eating them by the spoonful straight out of the pack! I really like adding a spoon or 2 to my salads and greek yogurt. I just started changing my diet, so this is the only brand I have actually bought (besides ones that are in chobani blueberry power flip). Shipping was super fast (took 2 days... I am in NJ) and I will definitely buy again in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Maleet

customer_reviews.title: Good hemp!
customer_reviews.text: I use this help for smoothies. Great taste mixes well!
customer_reviews.author: Beajay

customer_reviews.title: Great source for protein supplement.
customer_reviews.text: Great source of protein for my smoothies. I can not use soy or milk or pea protein. So I am very pleased to have another option.
customer_reviews.author: R. Keith

customer_reviews.title: My favorite Hemp powder
customer_reviews.text: I love this help protein powder. It blends perfectly in my smoothies.. Great taste, NOT lumpy or gritty.. I also love that it's cold pressed
customer_reviews.author: Michele zar

customer_reviews.title: Just a powder
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a sense of anxiety free or a relaxing effect unfortunately I have been using it for a few times but I guess it's just good for cooking as a spice maybe😳
customer_reviews.author: Camara Maya

customer_reviews.title: Gross and Grainy
customer_reviews.text: Overpowering flavor. I'm not very picky, but I'm just not a fan at all. Doesn't blend well - don't even think of trying to use this without running it through a blender first. It's a high quality healthy product, just not one I'll be using or purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Grainy and earthy
customer_reviews.text: Tastes disgusting and so grainy in smoothies. I’ve tried lots of proteins and this is one of the worst
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Someone stabbed my hemp
customer_reviews.text: I’m sure this product would have been delicious but it arrived with a razor hole in the package so I will never know. Yikes!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: Four tablespoons is a lot but don’t have any digestive problems associated with other protein supplements
customer_reviews.author: Applerox

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love these in smoothies... on rice cakes over some avocado and lemon juice/or rice cakes with peanut butter, banana and cinnamon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids love
customer_reviews.text: My family loves this we use it for shakes and protein pancakes 🥞 I’m super happy for the taste and that I could get my kids to be somewhat healthy lol 😂
customer_reviews.author: Diamond Shunte

customer_reviews.title: High quality, smooth and not grainy at all
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I just bought my 3rd bag. I use 2 tbs with 1/2-1c Kale, 1/2c spinach, 1/4c blueberries or frozen mixed berries and 1tsp cinnamon 5-6 times a week. Sometimes I add 1 tbs of my chocolate flavored plant based powder. It isn’t grainy like other hemp powders I have tried. I did a lot of research and this seems to be high quality and one of the best out there.
customer_reviews.author: DLR

customer_reviews.title: good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Super healthy fats and fiber in this stuff, the protein is an afterthought for me. I use only a tablespoon in my large morning smoothies. Blends well but tastes green.
customer_reviews.author: J. King

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered this twice now and I do like it. Taste is mild and mixes easily. I add into granola or shakes. Don't have anything bad to report. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Johnna

customer_reviews.title: Navitas Hemp Powder
customer_reviews.text: The most nutritional product you can hemp powder has so many amazing benefits omega 3's fiber energy. This product mixes great in fruit or vegetable smoothies + great price
customer_reviews.author: Mocha

customer_reviews.title: Love this Hemp Powder!
customer_reviews.text: Love this Hemp Protein. It is a great booster for energy without adding specific flavors like many other protein powders do, e.g. vanilla, chocolate. This protein has nothing added to it - just simple hemp powder! Super natural stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: Good additive to my protein shake. High in fiber, and ground pretty smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Tiny Tina

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is your basic hemp protein and it works well. It's just a little gritty sometimes. I wish it would mix a little better. But it's good for the price
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte shopper

customer_reviews.title: Part of my families diet for health.
customer_reviews.text: Great for smoothies. They add a nutty, rich flavor to my shakes and their nutritional value is important to me. Health and Nutrition go hand in hand and adding hemp seeds will make you feel fuller even with just a smoothie for breakfast, so it aids in weight loss as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tobe

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: I use this in both veggie and fruit smoothies. It adds protein, fiber, Omega 3 & 6, without any noticeable taste. My health is improved since using this. Comes in resealable pouches. I buy only Navitas. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good.
customer_reviews.text: Just started using it. Tastes good. Using for smoothies and also sprinkling it in dogs food for health benefits... Time will tell and I will review further.

customer_reviews.title: WHY DIDN’T I GET TWO BAGS!!!
customer_reviews.text: It was suppose to be two BAGS. I got one.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Add these seeds to your morning smoothie~
customer_reviews.text: I would definitely recommend this product! I add it to my morning smoothie to get that extra protein and oomph to start off my day clean and right! Also great for those who suffer from inflammation since it contains omega-6 and omega-3.
customer_reviews.author: April Kitty

customer_reviews.title: best hemp on the market
customer_reviews.text: We love using hemp due to its health benefits. We have tried a few other brands and some of them had an after taste. Tried Navitas Hemp and loved it. We use it in a variety of ways, in drinks, desserts, salads, baked items, etc. Here are a few recipes using this hemp: [...]

customer_reviews.title: Easiest form of hemp to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and mild tasting. I add it to my morning oats and hardly know its there.

customer_reviews.title: did wonders on me
customer_reviews.text: This product is wonderful! I put them in my grain shake in the morning and this helped my digestive system so much! It is my third time purchasing and I might need a fourth bag soon!

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: The taste was great I eat it like oatmeal in the morning it's so delicious

customer_reviews.title: Second time purchasing - good flavor and blends well when added to my smoothies ...
customer_reviews.text: Second time purchasing - good flavor and blends well when added to my smoothies (especially with powdered peanut butter and coffee!), nutritious, keeps me full.

customer_reviews.title: great source of protein
customer_reviews.text: I use this in smoothies and they add a thickening without an additional taste. Good product. Ships quickly.

customer_reviews.text: My son has Crohn's Disease. We have been using this since his bowel resection. I think it will help with inflammation. Easy to use and he doesnt mind it in his foods.

customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this brand for a while and always add to my breakfast smoothie. Like the subscribe and save part so I don't have to think about whether I need to shop for more, it just come automatically. This is a great brand and I am always pleased with the quality of the product.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I use to mix it in my salads. Tastes really good.

customer_reviews.title: Canadian company.
customer_reviews.text: I stick with nutiva as often as I can considering the company is Canadian based, which means higher standards for health. I add hemp seeds to my oatmeal or smoothies.

customer_reviews.title: Healthy plant based food to use in so many ways.
customer_reviews.text: I love mixing it into yogurt and fresh fruit, sprinkling on waffles. Makes everything healthier!

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: A high quality product, value and taste. A small amount (mixed with juice) reduces hunger for hours. You don't even need a blender. No mess, no fuss. Just protein.

customer_reviews.text: Love this item, I especially love the nutty flavor, will purchase again.

customer_reviews.title: Works fine but only use a little
customer_reviews.text: Works fine but only use a little. I thought I used a tiny bit but that’s all I could taste in my smoothie.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Great for health, Bad for taste buds
customer_reviews.text: Great benefits- Only reason not five stars is because it tastes and smells absolutely atrocious.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Love this protein powder
customer_reviews.text: Being a whole foodist, I'm always looking for ways to incorporate more protein into my diet. This hemp powder fits the bill perfectly and I love putting a tablespoon each day into a cocoa/banana smoothie.
customer_reviews.author: Lexy Bourne

customer_reviews.title: Repeat Purchaser - Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased Navitas Organics Hemp Seeds several times. Fresh and tasty every time!
customer_reviews.author: Sp1nster

product_meta.title: Navitas Organics Hemp Seeds, 8 oz. Bag — Organic, Non-GMO, Low Temp-Hulled, Gluten-Free
product_meta.description: Flavor:Hemp Seeds| Size:8 Ounce (Pack of 1)Soft and delicious, Navitas Organics Hemp Seeds pack a powerful punch of pure plant nutrition. A truly super food, Hemp Seeds are one of the only plants that contain all nine essential amino acids, offering the body complete protein! They're also a fantastic source of essential fatty acids, rich in both omega-3s and omega-6s, and essential minerals including iron and magnesium. Navitas Organics Hemp Seeds are organically grown by small family farmers in Canada. The premium seeds are gently de-shelled to reveal the soft and nutritious Hemp hearts. With their mild nutty flavor, Navitas Organics Hemp Seeds can be enjoyed straight out of the bag or sprinkled onto vitually any dish (including yogurt, cereals, toast, salads, soups, and baked goods) for a boost of essential nutrition.
feature_bullets: Navitas Organics Hemp Seeds are a powerhouse of nutrition—providing substantial essential minerals, fiber and protein.
Containing all 9 essential amino acids, Hemp Seeds are one of nature's only plant-based complete proteins.
Great source of essential fatty acids, which are necessary for optimal functioning. Hemp naturally boasts the ideal ratio of omega-3 to omega-6 fatty acids for our bodies!
With a bright nutty flavor, easily add Navitas Organics Hemp Seeds to smoothies, salads, dressings, burgers, energy bars, oatmeal and more.
USDA Organic, Kosher, Non-GMO, vegan, gluten-free.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
